dcterms:description: RoadTracer is a dataset for automatic extraction of road networks from aerial images, consisting of high-resolution images and corresponding ground truth road graphs.

dcterms:description: SpaceNet3 is a remote sensing dataset and challenge series designed for various tasks including road extraction and building footprint detection.
dcterms:title: SpaceNet3

dcterms:creator: Volodymyr Mnih
dcterms:description: The Massachusetts roads dataset is used for aerial image labeling, providing ground truth annotations for road extraction tasks.

dcterms:description: DeepGlobe is a challenge dataset aimed at parsing the earth through satellite images, focusing on various tasks including road extraction.

dcterms:description: The CrowdAI Mapping Challenge dataset is designed for deep learning applications in satellite imagery, providing a platform for various mapping tasks.
